description: React component for step 1 of a registration form, handling user input validation, state management, and rendering UI elements for name and email collection.

methods.name: handleNameChange
methods.description: Updates fullName state and clears name error when user types in the name input field.

methods.name: handleEmailChange
methods.description: Updates email state and validates email input using registerEmailValidator, setting error message if invalid.

methods.name: handleNext
methods.description: Validates name and email fields; if valid, updates formData and proceeds to next step.
